title: vegan-friendly bay area eats

A Map by Coffywoman

A map of vegan and vegan-friendly restaurants in the Bay Area (from Santa Cruz to San Francisco)...

properties.name: Cafe La Vie
properties.description: Posted by Happycow   429 Front St, Santa Cruz, California, United States, North America100% VegetarianRestaurantReviews

properties.name: Charlie Hong Kong
properties.description: Posted by Tanabutler  1141 Soquel Avenue, Santa Cruz, CA, 95062Charlie Hong Kong 831-426-5664 1141 Soquel Avenue, Santa Cruz, Ca 95062 Charlie Hong Kong\'s business philosophy is to conduct its day to day business according to values that respect people, the environment, the community, and the larger global society. Our core values serve to guide the development of our policies, management style, and the day to day actions within and outside the business itself so that our impact on the planet is both bold yet gentle. In broad terms, these values are: Respect · Our actions show respect for each other, our customers, our community, and society. Integrity · We are honest in our dealings with each other, our customers, and our community . Accountability · As professionals, we are accountable for our actions and take responsibility for the safety of each other, our customers and the community . Fun · We believe the workplace should be a spiritually uplifting experience where joy and laughter are frequently found. Courage · To grow and to develop requires some risk-taking. We encourage each other to keep expanding our personal and professional boundaries.

properties.name: Tofoo Com Chay
properties.description: Posted by Coffywoman  388 E Santa Clara St, San Jose 95113 Cheap mock meat and tofu dishes. All vegan except for the occasional dairy-based dessert. Favorite dishes include: lemon chicken, lemongrass gluten, veggie drumsticks, black pepper sausage, basil eggplant, and their steamed vegetable buns.

properties.name: Zeni Ethiopian Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Coffywoman 1320 Saratoga Ave, San Jose, CAYummy Ethiopian food. Lots of vegan selections.
